translations.name: Today's German Bible
translations.description: Die Gute Nachricht Bibel or the Good News Bible was published in 2001 by two organizations, one Catholic, one Protestant: the Catholic Bible Society and the German Bible Society, making it one of the most recent ecumenical Bibles in German-speaking countries. It is popular among protestant readers and approved by the Vatican for private study.
